author: Patriot66
title: Why what Bernie said was not true!
text: Quote: Originally Posted by Camelot This comes from a Wingnut whose party has a reality t.v. personality and a mentally unbalanced black guy leading in your polls. The Democrats made them look laughable in contrast last night. This coming from the Oldest, whitest, party on Earth. Who still gets the black vote why no diversity, got to keep them on the plantation. Even Obama is run by Valerie Jarrett
